HOUSE BILL/RESOLUTION HISTORY
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00298
ADOPTED AS RESOLUTION NO. HR00011
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION CONDEMNING IN THE STRONGEST POSSIBLE TERMS THE DASTARDLY TERRORISTIC ATTACK IN DAVAO CITY, EXPRESSING SUPPORT TO PRESIDENT RODRIGO ROA DUTERTE IN HIS EFFORTS TO PREVENT OR SUPPRESS LAWLESS VIOLENCE IN THE COUNTRY, AND EXTENDING ITS DEEPEST CONDOLENCES AND SYMPATHIES TO THE FAMILIES OF THOSE KILLED AND INJURED
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALVAREZ, PANTALEON D., FARIÑAS, RODOLFO C., SUAREZ, DANILO E., TAMBUNTING, GUS S., BONDOC, JUAN PABLO "RIMPY", ALBANO, RODOLFO III T., GARCIA-ALBANO, MYLENE J., GO, ANA CRISTINA SIQUIAN, ABU, RANEO "RANIE" E., PANGANIBAN, JOSE JR. T.
